channel.title: +Bicycle on Vishvas's notes
channel.description: Recent content in +Bicycle on Vishvas's notes

item.title: Cycling
item.description: Posture While sitting upright: (5 degrees backward from the vertical). Also, even while holding the handle, ensure that the spinal chord behind the stomach is not concave but convex. You should be able to keep a slight bend in your elbows and not feel stretched out when holding the handlebars. Seat height and angle ‘You want to have the bicycle seat set to a height that allows your leg to extend until it is almost completely straight when you are sitting on the seat.
